alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Madison and east central Limestone Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Madison, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama A And M University, Marshall Space Flight Center, University Of Alabama In Huntsville, Harvest, Huntsville International Airport, Laceys Spring, and Farley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
